title: Login
code:
<gds-grid width="100%" gap="xl" columns="1; l{2}" height="100vh">
  <gds-img src="https://api.seb.io/assets/seb-private.jpg" object-fit="cover" border-radius="m" min-width="100%"></gds-img>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s" width="100%" height="100%" align-items="center" justify-content="center">
    <gds-card>
      <gds-text font="heading-s">Login with BankID</gds-text>
      <gds-segmented-control value="card">
        <gds-segment value="mobile">Mobile BankID</gds-segment>
        <gds-segment value="card">BankID on card</gds-segment>
      </gds-segmented-control>
      <gds-text font="body-regular-m" text-align="center">
        Start the BankID app on your phone or tablet and press Scan QR code.
      </gds-text>
      <gds-img 
        width="150" 
        height="150" 
        margin="0 auto" 
        src="https://api.seb.io/assets/qr-code.jpg">  
      </gds-img>
      <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
        <gds-divider color="subtle-01"></gds-divider>
        <gds-text>or</gds-text>
        <gds-divider color="subtle-01"></gds-divider>
      </gds-flex>
      <gds-button rank="secondary">
        <gds-icon-brand-bankid slot="lead"></gds-icon-brand-bankid>
        BankID on this device
      </gds-button>
      <gds-button rank="tertiary">
        Change login method
      </gds-button>
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-grid>
